comment.p: Space invaders and other games on 8080 Hardware.
All games can be built from MAME sets.

revision.comment: Updated dats for Laser v0.20 (there are 45 more games now).
Updated dats for Laser v0.19 (laser and yosakdon added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.18 (various games added and removed due to the new driver system).
Updated dats for Laser v0.17 (yosakdon added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.16 (several games added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.16 (Ozma Wars, Solar Fight, Space Phantoms, Star Wars added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.15 (Space Chaser added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.14 (Clowns and Lupin III added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.13 (two games added).
Updated dats for Laser v0.11a (two games added).
Just to mention that the existing dat is suitable for Laser v0.6.
Logiqx released CMPro/RomCenter dats for Laser v0.5.
